ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Parker Solar Probe, PSP, FIELDS Suite, Digital Fields Board, DFB, Instrument
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Solar Probe Plus, SPP, FIELDS Suite, Digital Fields Board, DFB, Instrument
ResourceHeader.Description: The Parker Solar Probe, PSP, Digital Fields Board, DFB, is responsible for conditioning, digitization, and processing signals from the five voltage sensors and four search coil magnetometers, SCM, over a frequency range from DC to approximately 60 kHz, as well as production of a calibration signal delivered to the SCM. These nine analog inputs are processed by the DFB into twenty five digital data streams, which are then used to produce a range of time domain and spectral domain data products.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge NASA, Stuart D. Bale, the PSP FIELDS Instrument Suite Principal Investigator, and Nicola J. Fox, the PSP Project Scientist.
